project.description:
demonstrated bug: PMR xxxxx
howto reproduce: $> mvn clean install Deploy this WebApp on WAS and bench the webapp with Apache JMeter.
Navigate to http://localhost:9080/was_bug11/index.xhtml
On my box (4x3.2GHz i5) I got 600 p/s on TomEE and only 3 p/s on WAS. That means the WAS performance is _insanely_ slow.
